title: Spongellé Pedi-Buffer - Cleanse, Exfoliate & Polish Feet - Honey Blossom
description: Melt away in a luxury bathing experience with Spongellé. Using an incredibly innovative design and a blend of high-quality ingredients, Spongellé goes beyond cleansing to pamper you with a unique showering experience. The patented pedi-buffers, are formulated with exotic extracts and rich moisturisers , whilst the buffer has specific cleansing and exfoliating sides, designed to be an all-in-I product to keep your feet feeling amazingly soft, use after use.
